questions.question: Your favorite song is?
options: The newest pop/rap mix that everyone's downloading

questions.question: You are hanging with your BFFs, and one of your crew's boyfriends or girlfriends comes along. He/She starts talking like they're the only ones there. What would you do?
options: Hang around and smile, but only if you're invited to.
Boldly join in. Hey! You exist too!
Slowly back out. It's their personal conversation; you shouldn't listen.
Make your disdain visible just to her.
Follow your friend's leads. They know what to do!

questions.question: What would be your perfect date?
options: Sitting on a park bench talking
A movie followed by an ice cream. Classic.
A meal at a five-star restaurant

questions.question: Which of these values matters to you the most?
If you could have dinner with anyone in the world, whom would it be and why?
Do you think you'd like to be famous? What would you be famous for?
Before you call someone, do you take time to think about what you are going to say to them?
What does a perfect day look like to you?
What do you have in common with your family?
